definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Therefore, the paper studies the flotation characteristic of Low-grade barite.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本文進行了低品位重晶石的浮選特性研究。

sentences.english: Barite was found as inclusions in garnet of eclogite from the main borehole core of the Chinese Continental Scientific Drilling.
sentences.chinese: 在中國大陸科學鑽探主孔榴輝巖中發現了重晶石。

sentences.english: Barite usually contain strontium and calcium.
Barite is one of the weighting materials.
sentences.chinese: 重晶石粉是加重材料的一種。

sentences.english: Tending to be used as an alternative to barytes to reduce cost.
sentences.chinese: 趨向用作是減少成本的重晶石的替換物。

sentences.english: Prismatic crystal of Barite on Calcite crystals.
sentences.chinese: 柱狀晶形的重晶石在方解石晶簇上。

sentences.english: I have two large mining companies, mainly barite and fluorite.
sentences.chinese: 我公司擁有兩座大型礦山，主要是重晶石和螢石。

sentences.english: This paper presents the distribution characters of the geological era and space about the strata-bound barytes ore deposits in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 本文概述了貴州層控重晶石礦牀的時空分佈特徵。

sentences.english: At least 80 tons Barite should be kept on hand at rig.
sentences.chinese: 平臺上必須儲備至少80噸的重晶石粉。

sentences.english: In addition, I have seen one made with barite the so-called glowing pearl.
sentences.chinese: 此外，筆者曾看到一顆用重晶石製成的所謂夜明珠。

sentences.english: Due to the different origin of natural barite so it is grade different.
sentences.chinese: 天然重晶石由於產地的不同，礦的品位不同。

definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
